title: Docker on Western Devs
description: In a month, I’ll be attempting to hound my share of glory at MeasureUP with a talk on using Docker for people who may not think it impacts them. In it, I’ll demonstrate some uses of Docker today in a …

title: New & faster message window with slash commands
description:
